startUrls.title: Start URLs (one or more)
startUrls.description: One or more root domains/URLs to crawl. Example: https://example.com or example.com

maxPages.title: Max pages to crawl (per start URL)
maxPages.description: Set 0 to crawl all discovered in-domain pages for each start URL.

maxCrawlDepth.title: Max click depth
maxCrawlDepth.description: 0 = unlimited depth. 1 = only links from the start page. 2+ = deeper crawl.

followSubdomains.title: Include subdomains
followSubdomains.description: If true, crawling includes subdomains of the target domain.

maxConcurrency.title: Max crawler concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Higher values are faster but heavier on resources.

requestTimeoutSecs.title: Crawler request timeout (seconds)
requestTimeoutSecs.description: How long to wait for each page request before timing out.

includeNofollow.title: Include nofollow links
includeNofollow.description: If true, links marked with rel=nofollow will also be checked.

checkDomainExpiry.title: Try to detect likely expired target domains
checkDomainExpiry.description: Adds DNS/root checks for each broken link domain.

checkTimeoutSecs.title: Outgoing link check timeout (seconds)
checkTimeoutSecs.description: How long to wait when checking each outgoing link before timing out.

linkCheckConcurrency.title: Outgoing link check concurrency
linkCheckConcurrency.description: Number of outgoing links to check simultaneously.

useApifyProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useApifyProxy.description: Enable Apify Proxy for crawling and outgoing link checks.

useResidentialProxies.title: Use residential proxies (Apify add-on)
useResidentialProxies.description: If enabled, actor requests proxy group RESIDENTIAL. Charges depend on your Apify plan.

apifyProxyGroups.title: Additional Apify Proxy groups
apifyProxyGroups.description: Optional extra groups such as SHADER, BUYPROXIES94952, etc.
